statements: UPDATE regions SET population = 100000 WHERE region_id = 1;

UPDATE regions SET population = population + 100 WHERE region_name = 'East Region';
UPDATE demographic_data SET percentage = 75.5 WHERE demographic_category = 'Age Group'
